tool_description: Identifies duplicate and near-duplicate digital assets using various comparison methods including file hashing, content similarity, and metadata matching.

file_paths.description: Array of file paths to check for duplicates

comparison_method.description: Comparison method: hash, content_similarity, metadata, filename, hybrid

hash_algorithm.description: Hash algorithm for exact duplicates: md5, sha1, sha256

metadata_fields.description: Specific metadata fields to compare for metadata-based detection

ignore_extensions.description: Ignore file extensions when comparing filenames

error_messages: Invalid comparison method: Use hash, content_similarity, metadata, filename, or hybrid
Invalid similarity threshold: Must be between 0.0 and 1.0
Invalid hash algorithm: Use md5, sha1, or sha256
Insufficient files: At least 2 files required for duplicate detection
File access error: One or more files in the array cannot be accessed
usage: Provide array of file_paths and choose comparison_method. Adjust similarity_threshold for near-duplicate sensitivity and specify metadata_fields for metadata-based comparison.

duplicate_groups.description: Groups of duplicate files, each group as comma-separated file paths

total_duplicates.description: Total number of duplicate files found

space_savings.description: Potential storage space savings in bytes
